entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 06:03 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -37.6°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -41.2°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
